thread.title: Woman horrifically scarred when her jealous friend threw acid over her in her SLEEP has life-changing op – and has now got married
thread.title_full: Woman horrifically scarred when her jealous friend threw acid over her in her SLEEP has life-changing op – and has now got married

author: adowney
title: Woman horrifically scarred when her jealous friend threw acid over her in her SLEEP has life-changing op – and has now got married
text:
Mrs Crunch 'MY FACE IS TRANSFORMED' Woman horrifically scarred when her jealous friend threw acid over her in her SLEEP has life-changing op – and has now got married 
Surgeons have spent the past 10 years painstakingly rebuilding her face, including completely remodelling her nose with tissue from her thigh Warning
